steps.nodeStepDescription: Jump a second time after leaving the ground.
An explosive grenade which deals additional damage when attached to enemies.
Hitting an enemy with Blink Strike grants brief invisibility.
Press  during Arc Blade to damage nearby enemies.
Kills with Arc Blade and Blink Strike immediately regenerate health.
Gain invisibility after crouching in place for a short time.
Killing an enemy with Arc Blade extends its duration.
Increases the duration of invisibility effects.
Increases maximum sprint speed and extends slide distance.
Weapons ready immediately.
A powerful melee attack with extended range.
Reduces the cooldown of Blink Strike.
Run faster.
A short distance teleport that replaces Double Jump.
Upgrades  Double Jump for even greater height.
A grenade that chains bolts of lightning to nearby enemies.
A grenade which splits on impact, creating multiple projectiles which seek enemies.
Press   during Arc Blade to unleash a destructive wave of energy that travels along the ground.
Press   during Arc Blade to disappear from sight.
Charge your blade with Arc Light and consume your foes with lightning.
Upgrades Double Jump for better directional control while in the air.
Hitting an enemy from behind with Blink Strike causes significantly more damage.
Training focused on toughness at all costs.
Training focused on toughness and speed.
Use your blade.
Training focused on battle recovery and speed.
Training focused on battle recovery and toughness.
Training focused on maximum battle recovery.
Training focused on all attributes.
